name: AMERICAN ASSOCIATION FOR JUSTICE
sampleDescriptions:
Civil justice issues;
Infrastructure Expansion Act of 2017, H.R. 3808.
H.R. 7, Paycheck Fairness Act.
Shareholder arbitration issues.
Modifying Medicare Secondary Payer rules.
Section 213 of S.1895, the Lower Health Care Cost Act, related to modernizing the labeling of certain generic drugs.
